who/what is elph/elphcomics?

Elph (pronounced same as ‚Äúelf‚Äù) is my artist persona (thats how I‚Äôd describe it ig?) It‚Äôs basically the name I like signing on my art with (see: Elph Mart on cornerstore chaos (wish I had more examples of this on my website but I tend to add it more on sketches and more inked work, which I don‚Äôt keep on my portfolio)), the name I publish comics under (or at least plan to üò≠), and in general my username for online platforms that are more social and fun (think tiktok, video games, discord‚Ä¶). A lot of people ask me where the name comes from and ngl there‚Äôs not crazy meaning behind it, I just liked the vibes and idea of an elf, but I knew that I would never come up in a google search if I made ‚Äúelf‚Äù my username. The ‚Äúcomics‚Äù part I just add because for some reason the user ‚Äúelph‚Äù usually already exists.
